title: CAN WE GIVE SEJUANI SOME LOVE
body: so i have bee playing sejuani for a few months now, and im noticing some pretty game deciding bugs that would make her so much better to play, maybe even some buff plz *hint hint riot <3*. but seriously here are the 2 bugs. number 1 if sejuani q's an enemy it will sometimes do double damage "from what i understand it is when they are walking perpendicular to where you are chargering" and this is causing me to lose/win games when i see her having a full tank sejuani do like 500 dmg with a q/having a ap sejuani do 1000 damage with a q all of a sudden its dumb|number 2 the massive W bug where sejuani's auto attack wont go through and you lost out on some decent %damage because of this.now about buffing her in general? idk i just hate/love these 2 bugs but they need to be removed plz rito. {{champion:113}}  {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Weird, never heard of those. Sounds like the enemy-percent heatlh scalings that were moved from q to w some patches ago in some scenarios... get... reversed?

I'm a programmer, and I have to wonder, if that's what's happening, how the heck is damaged programmed here. That would be some seriously oddball crossed wires in the logic.

thats why it is so weird to me. the w thing has been known for quite some time though, but the q double damage thing is a problem i found a video of it somewhere to show proof but i cant find it anymore :(
